code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{fetchTestimonials}from'../redux/actions/testimonialActions';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Testimonials=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const testimonials=useSelector(state=>state.testimonial.testimonials);const loading=useSelector(state=>state.testimonial.loading);const error=useSelector(state=>state.testimonial.error);useEffect(()=>{dispatch(fetchTestimonials());},[dispatch]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-10",children:"Loading testimonials..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-10 text-red-500",children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"py-24 bg-gray-900 text-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 md:px-5 lg:px-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-12",children:"What Our Clients Say"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",children:testimonials.map(testimonial=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg flex flex-col items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold mb-2",children:testimonial.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-400 mb-4 text-center",children:testimonial.message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-yellow-400 text-lg",children:["Rating: ",testimonial.rating," \u2605"]})]},testimonial._id))})]})});};export default Testimonials;
